author: Vyse
text:
Thank you, Rushia! It was nice and fun to see you play with Shion. Rushion was adorable to watch.
My favorite time stamps.
12:25 Shion gets locked up.
19:12 Portal to home is disrupted by a special guest... Panic Mode initiated.
20:37 Rushia sets up a trap for herself.
50:12 Rushia and Shion spending time together in jail.
52:34 Rushia and Shion flirt with a poison bottle and a punch.
1:11:36 Rushia and Shion discover the Force.
1:13:50 Staring into Miko's soul.
1:15:52 Rushia falls again.
1:19:44 Rushia and Shion speaks cute English.
1:21:10 Tsunomaki Watame Janken Time.
1:22:06 Shion's Scissors loses against Watame's Paper... wait she actually won.
1:22:32 Rushia plays Janken... she... lo--- WINS!
1:29:38 Rushia and Shion come across a horny ship with music.
1:32:30 School is dangerous.
1:36:34 Amazed by door.
1:37:20 Discovery of a toilet and Rushia peeks.
1:38:02 Rushia discovers a library and plays with switches. Very cute.
1:39:34 Rushia's Ramen Restaurant.
1:42:43 The view looks nice! Let's have a look...?!?!
1:48:24 Jumping  in lava to find a secret.

author: Nexcell Pride
text:
The best combination ever...
This duet needs more collabs. I have a name for it: "Sweet Runerushi" :_るんるん::_ちょうちょ:🌙🌠

Also first collab at New PC.

I don't know, but Shion and Rushia are dynamite when are together. Not only about crazyness or wackyness, also their laughters are so contagious. 
(We need more clips about Shion-chan and Rushia-daitenshi laughing) 

If talking about duo, this is the second time. The first one was with "Animal Accomodation" (Also named Animal Tower or Animal Tetris), it was streamed at 2020 July 9th, only at Shion-chan's channel.

Missions were from the most dangerous to the most sofisticated. :_ハート:

Rushia becomes the best girlfriend for all LiveChat and her fans... I wish for Shion's fans the same with Shion-chan... The riddle is how she can react...

Yes, totally glad about it. :_るんるん::_ちょうちょ::_ハート::_きゅん:
